title: Biogenic fabrication of a gold nanoparticle sensor for detection of Fe3+ ions using a smartphone and machine learning
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20466-20478
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03265A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kim-Phuong T. Dang, T. Thanh-Giang Nguyen, Tien-Dung Cao, Van-Dung Le, Chi-Hien Dang, Nguyen Phuc Hoang Duy, Pham Thi Thuy Phuong, Do Manh Huy, Tran Thi Kim Chi, Thanh-Danh Nguyen
Our study introduces a novel approach to utilize biogenic gold nanoparticle (AuNP) sensors in conjunction with designing a lightbox with a color reference and machine learning for detection of Fe3+ ions in water.
